content: repeat previous round once more *p1 k2tog repeat from * to end *p1 k1 repeat from * to end k2tog to end k1 1 1 0 1 0 *k2tog repeat from * to end 6 7 8 8 9 9 sts now on needles cut yarn using tapestry needle draw yarn tail through remaining stitches on needles pull snug weave in ends and block optional add pompom to the top of hat www toltyarnandwool com 3 all text images and illustration © tolt yarn and wool 2022 about rachel rachel kieselburg has dabbled in many creative pursuits before finding her home in the fiber community she learned to knit from her grandmother as a child but got serious about it in her twenties when not knitting or working at tolt yarn and wool she enjoys hiking photography traveling the world and browsing used book/record stores follow her on instagram @modaveloce www toltyarnandwool com version 1 0 4 all text images and illustration © tolt yarn and wool 2022
